snippet: The Supreme Court said Tuesday that it would not interfere with a previous order requiring California to cut its prison population by thousands of inmates.
abstract: Supreme Court says it will not interfere with previous order requiring California to cut its prison population by thousands of inmates, leaving Gov Jerry Brown with just one more chance to persuade lower court to delay or stop releases.
lead_paragraph: The Supreme Court said Tuesday that it would not interfere with a previous order requiring California to cut its prison population by thousands of inmates.
